snippet: Hillary Rodham Clinton’s news conference explaining her use of private email devolved into sharp-toned questions and increasingly defensive responses.
abstract: News Analysis; Hillary Rodham Clinton's news conference explaining her use of private email to conduct business while secretary of state quickly turned into repartee of sharp questions and increasingly defensive answers, both in what she said and in her demeanor in saying it; she turned to lawyerly argument and asked public to trust her, before walking off stage as reporters asked more questions.
lead_paragraph: Hillary Rodham Clinton’s news conference explaining her use of private email devolved into sharp-toned questions and increasingly defensive responses.

headline.print_headline: An Email Defense That Turned Defensive
headline.main: A Clinton Email Defense That Turned Defensive
